mapper.select: select * from pro_product order by preceivingdate desc
select * from pro_product where pname = #{pname} and userbno = #{userbno}
select * from pro_product where preceivingdate = #{preceivingdate} and userbno = #{userbno}
select * from pro_product where pshippingdate = #{pshippingdate} and userbno = #{userbno}
select * from pro_fruits where fmonth = date_format(now(), '%m');

SELECT MAX(syseq) AS syseq, DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE() - INTERVAL 1 YEAR, '%Y-%m' ) AS syday, MAX(syproduct) AS syproduct, SUM(sycnt) AS sycnt, MAX(wtemperature) AS wtemperature, MAX(wmintemperature) AS wmintemperature, MAX(wmaxtemperature) AS wmaxtemperature, MAX(wprecipitation) AS wprecipitation, MAX(whumidity) AS whumidity, MAX(scnt) AS scnt FROM pro_synthesis WHERE DATE_FORMAT(syday, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE() - INTERVAL 1 YEAR, '%Y-%m') GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE() - INTERVAL 1 YEAR, '%Y-%m'), syproduct;

SELECT syproduct, wtemperature, CAST(SUM(sycnt) AS SIGNED) AS sycnt FROM ( SELECT syproduct, CASE WHEN wtemperature >= -15 AND wtemperature < -10 THEN -15 WHEN wtemperature >= -10 AND wtemperature < -5 THEN -10 WHEN wtemperature >= -5 AND wtemperature < 0 THEN -5 WHEN wtemperature >= 0 AND wtemperature < 5 THEN 0 WHEN wtemperature >= 5 AND wtemperature < 10 THEN 5 WHEN wtemperature >= 10 AND wtemperature < 15 THEN 10 WHEN wtemperature >= 15 AND wtemperature < 20 THEN 15 WHEN wtemperature >= 20 AND wtemperature < 25 THEN 20 WHEN wtemperature >= 25 AND wtemperature < 30 THEN 25 WHEN wtemperature >= 30 AND wtemperature < 35 THEN 30 ELSE 35 END AS wtemperature, sycnt FROM pro_synthesis WHERE wtemperature >= -15 AND wtemperature <= 35 AND YEAR(syday) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE) - 1 ) AS subquery GROUP BY syproduct, wtemperature ORDER BY wtemperature ASC;
